root.name: Attack Animal Gakuen
root.description: OverviewAnimal Attack Gakuen ("Animal Attack Academy") is a third-person run-and-gun shooter that has more than a few similarities to Space Harrier. Rather than being a space adventurer on an alien world, Animal Attack Gakuen has the player control a schoolgirl as she blasts various evil animals in a bid to rescue her friends.The game was one of the few to incorporate the Famicom 3-D System glasses, which, like this game, were never released outside of Japan.
